name: getOpacityRamp(for:startOpacity:endOpacity:timeRange:)
desc: Obtains the opacity ramp that includes a specified time.
declaration:
func getOpacityRamp(for time: CMTime, 
       startOpacity: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>?, 
         endOpacity: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>?, 
          timeRange: UnsafeMutablePointer<CMTimeRange>?) -> Bool
